title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 56.2 - Responsibility for compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 56.2 - Responsibility for compliance

State Regulations

Compliance with the requirements of article 7-A of the

Education Law and of this Part shall be the responsibility of the sponsor. A
sponsor which delegates specific responsibilities to the test publisher or
another agent shall so advise the department in writing within 15 days after
making such delegation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
56.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
